mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER, ROLE) VALUES ('USER' || LPAD((SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(USER_ID, 5))) + 1, 1) FROM USERS), 4, '0'), #{email}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME as userName, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, ROLE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{value}
SELECT USER_ID as userId, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME as userName, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, ROLE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
SELECT USER_ID as userId, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME as userName, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, ROLE FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = CONCAT('encrypted_', #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), USER_NAME = #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
